transArray.content: Satisfied, the service is very good, the accommodation conditions are also very good, and the equipment is very advanced. There is also a robot that delivers meals. The conditions are also good. The curtains are all smart.

Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. Breeze ten miles away, stars thousands miles away, you are a little treasure just like them. I love you little man.
